arcs.name: Effortlessness of Change
arcs.description: Change is natural when we remove blocks, not effortful when we push
arcs.core_message: Change happens naturally when obstacles are removed, like water finding its path
key_language: As naturally as breath
Effortlessly, the way your body heals a cut
Without trying, without forcing
Change happens when we get out of its way
Like water flowing around obstacles
Your body knows how to do this
arcs.prompt_integration: Emphasize that change is a natural unfolding, not something that requires effort or force. Use metaphors of natural processes (healing, growth, water flowing).

arcs.name: Re-Minding (Not Learning)
arcs.description: The brain has been in peaceful states before - we're RE-MINDING it
arcs.core_message: You're not learning something new; you're remembering what you already know
key_language: Your body remembers how to feel at peace
Some part of you has always known this
You're accessing a state you've been in before
Re-minding yourself of what you already know
This feeling isn't new - it's a return
Your system remembers this state
arcs.prompt_integration: Frame all suggestions as remembering or returning to a known state, not acquiring something new. Emphasize recognition over learning.

arcs.name: Two Tempos of Change
arcs.description: Change can be sudden (bursting) or gradual (slow growth) - both valid
arcs.core_message: Honor whatever tempo of change feels right for you

bursting.name: The Bursting (Flower Bud)
language: Like a flower bud that's been preparing, ready to bloom in an instant
All the work has been done beneath the surface, and now...
Sometimes change happens in a moment of recognition
The breakthrough that's been building, ready to emerge

slow_growth.name: The Slow Growth (Seed Underground)
slow_growth.description: Gradual change, invisible work beneath the surface
language: Like a seed growing beneath the soil - invisible work until breakthrough
Patient, steady change building beneath awareness
Trust the process even when you can't see the growth

key_language: Change in its own time - sometimes sudden, sometimes gradual, always natural
Your body knows the tempo that's right for you
Fast or slow, both are perfect
The wisdom to unfold at exactly the right pace
arcs.prompt_integration: Include both possibilities - sudden shift and gradual change. Give explicit permission for whatever tempo emerges naturally.

arcs.name: Recognition Ego Strengthening
arcs.description: You are MORE than you realize - recognition, not inflation
arcs.core_message: Recognizing the power, capacity, and wholeness that's always been there
key_language: You are more powerful than you've been letting yourself remember
More wonderful, more capable than you've allowed yourself to recognize
Not becoming something new - recognizing what's always been true
The strength that's always been yours
Your inherent capacity, simply covered over
The truth of your capability, waiting to be recognized
arcs.prompt_integration: Frame ego strengthening as recognition of existing qualities, not creation of new ones. Use 'recognize' and 'remember' language, not 'become' or 'develop'.

arcs.name: Relief → Inspiration → New Life
arcs.description: The transformation sequence from weight to freedom
arcs.core_message: As weight lifts, energy returns, and new possibilities open

transformation_sequence.description: Acknowledge the burden at all levels
transformation_sequence.language: The weight you've been carrying - physically, emotionally, mentally, spiritually

transformation_sequence.description: Release of emotional baggage and limiting beliefs
transformation_sequence.language: As that weight begins to lift, emotional baggage releasing, old beliefs dissolving

transformation_sequence.description: Reclaim the energy that was bound up
transformation_sequence.language: And you feel energy returning - energy that was always yours, now freed up, available
Relief becomes inspiration, new possibilities opening before you
Inspiration becomes new life, living from your authentic self, your true nature

key_language: As that weight lifts, you feel energy returning
Energy that was always yours, now freed up
Relief becomes inspiration. Inspiration becomes new life.
The natural sequence of transformation unfolding
arcs.prompt_integration: Follow the 5-stage sequence: Weight → Lifting → Energy Returns → Inspiration → New Life. Emphasize that energy returns (not created), and transformation is natural unfolding.

arcs.name: Emotions Create Physical Tension
arcs.description: Clear emotions, release tension, return to true self
arcs.core_message: Unprocessed emotions create physical tension; releasing them reveals who you've always been
reversal_sequence: Allow them to move and release
key_language: These layers of protection served you once. Now we're gently removing what you no longer need.
Returning to who you've always been underneath the armor
Not becoming someone new. Remembering who you are.
As emotions clear, tension releases, and you return to yourself
The real you, beneath the protective layers
arcs.prompt_integration: Frame tension as protective armor, not pathology. Emphasize gentle release and return to authentic self beneath the protection.

arcs.name: Brain's Master Skill: Forgetting & Learning
arcs.description: The same skill that learned the problem can learn the solution
arcs.core_message: Your brain is masterful at both forgetting and learning - use that power
key_language: Your brain is a master at forgetting what no longer serves and learning something new
The same skill that learned fear can learn peace
Forgetting is as natural as learning
Your brain does this automatically - let it work for you
The mechanism that created the pattern can create a new one
arcs.prompt_integration: Reframe brain's capacity to form habits as a feature, not a bug. The same neuroplasticity that learned unwanted patterns can learn desired ones.

arcs.name: Mind-Body Unity
arcs.description: Mind and body are one system - changing one changes the other
arcs.core_message: Your mind and body are unified. A shift in one creates a shift in the other.
key_language: Your mind and body speak the same language
As your thoughts shift, your body responds
What changes in the mind, changes in the body
One system, deeply connected, working together
The body hears what the mind believes
Unified, whole, responsive to your intention
arcs.prompt_integration: Emphasize the bidirectional relationship between mind and body. Show how mental/emotional shifts naturally create physical changes and vice versa.

arcs.name: Parts Integration
arcs.description: All parts of you want the same thing - safety and wellbeing
arcs.core_message: Even conflicting parts share a common goal when we look beneath the surface
presenting_issues: part of me wants/part of me doesn't
key_language: Every part of you, even the ones that seem to conflict, wants your wellbeing
The part that resists and the part that wants change - both protecting you
When we listen to all parts, integration becomes natural
No part is the enemy. Each has wisdom to offer.
Beneath the conflict, a shared desire for your safety and happiness
All parts coming together, aligned in their true purpose
arcs.prompt_integration: Validate all parts as having positive intent. Frame integration as recognition of shared goals, not elimination of parts. Use dialogue between parts to find common ground.

arcs.name: Future Self Connection
arcs.description: Your future self is already there, calling you forward
arcs.core_message: Connect with the version of you who has already made this transformation
key_language: Imagine the you who has already made this change, looking back with wisdom
Your future self is already there, waiting, beckoning you forward
Step into the experience of being that version of you
What does your future self know that you're beginning to remember now?
From that future place, looking back, what wisdom arises?
The path illuminated by the one who's already walked it - you
arcs.prompt_integration: Use temporal perspective shifting to access resourceful future states. Have client experience themselves as already transformed, then bring that wisdom back to present.

arcs.name: Inner Wisdom Access
arcs.description: Deep within, you know what you need - we're creating space to hear it
arcs.core_message: The answers are within you. We're simply quieting the noise so you can hear them.
key_language: Beneath the noise, a quiet knowing
Your inner wisdom has been there all along
In the stillness, your truth becomes clear
The part of you that already knows, waiting to be heard
Wisdom rising from within, clear and certain
You've always known. Now you're ready to hear it.
arcs.prompt_integration: Create deep receptive states for inner wisdom to emerge. Use minimal guidance - more space for client's own knowing to surface. Frame therapist as facilitator, not source of answers.

arcs.name: Sensory Amplification
arcs.description: What we notice grows stronger - amplify the desired state through sensory detail
arcs.core_message: The more vividly you experience something, the more real it becomes
key_language: Notice how that feels in your body - really notice
And as you pay attention to that sensation, it grows stronger
What do you see? What do you hear? What do you feel?
The more you notice, the more vivid it becomes
Amplifying that experience with each breath
Rich, detailed, alive - growing with your attention
arcs.prompt_integration: Guide detailed sensory exploration of desired states. Layer sensory modalities (visual, kinesthetic, auditory) to deepen experience. What's noticed becomes amplified.

arcs.name: Resource Activation
arcs.description: You have resources you haven't fully accessed - let's activate them
arcs.core_message: Strengths, skills, and capacities you already possess, now fully available
key_language: Accessing resources you already have but perhaps haven't fully used
Strengths that are yours, now fully available
Every experience of resilience, every moment of courage - accessible now
Your inner resources, activated and ready
Capacity you've built over a lifetime, available in this moment
Not creating something new - activating what's already yours
arcs.prompt_integration: Guide recall and activation of past resources (times of strength, courage, resilience). Anchor these resources in body. Make them portable and accessible for future use.

arcs.name: Playful Learning
arcs.description: The play brain structure naturally contains learning - change through curiosity and joy
arcs.core_message: Your brain learns best through play, curiosity, and exploration - not pressure
key_language: What if this could be playful? Curious? Light?
Your brain learns naturally through play - that's how you learned everything important
Experimenting, exploring, discovering - no wrong moves, only feedback
The play brain holds the learning brain within it
Lightness in the process, joy in the exploration
Permission to try, to wonder, to play with possibilities
Not performing, but exploring. Not proving, but discovering.
arcs.prompt_integration: Frame change as playful exploration rather than serious work or performance. Emphasize that the brain's play circuits naturally activate learning. Remove pressure by introducing curiosity, experimentation, and permission to 'try things on' without commitment. The play brain structure neurologically contains learning pathways.

dream_arcs.name: Effortless Release (DREAM Foundation)
dream_arcs.description: Letting go happens naturally, no effort required
dream_arcs.core_message: Release, dissolve, melt - tension leaves without trying
key_language: Release
Dissolve
Melt
No need to...
Tension dissolves like sugar in warm water
Letting go as naturally as breath
Without effort, without forcing, simply allowing
dream_arcs.prompt_integration: Emphasize that release is effortless and natural. Use dissolving/melting imagery. No effort required from listener.

dream_arcs.name: Safe Drifting (DREAM Foundation)
dream_arcs.description: It's safe to let your mind wander, drift is natural and good
dream_arcs.core_message: Your mind can drift wherever it wishes - to sleep or rest, whatever feels right
key_language: Drift
Float
Wander
Easy to fall asleep or do whatever is best
Your mind can drift wherever it wishes
To sleep or simply rest, whatever feels right
Safe to let go, safe to wander, safe to sleep
dream_arcs.prompt_integration: Give explicit permission for mind to wander. Frame sleep as one option among many. Emphasize safety of drifting.

dream_arcs.name: Continuous Replenishment (DREAM Foundation)
dream_arcs.description: Each moment, your body is healing, replenishing, restoring
dream_arcs.core_message: Every breath, every moment - continuous renewal
key_language: Each breath
Every moment
Continuously
Ongoing restoration
Each moment your body replenishes itself completely
Cells renewing, systems restoring
Continuous healing, unfolding naturally
dream_arcs.prompt_integration: Weave replenishment suggestions throughout. Emphasize continuous, ongoing process. Link to breath and natural rhythms.

dream_arcs.name: Progressive Body Journey (DREAM Somatic)
dream_arcs.description: Systematic body scanning, walking up or down the body
dream_arcs.core_message: Notice each part, release each part, rest completely

ascending.name: Feet → Head (Grounding to Release)
ascending.sequence: Feet/Toes → Ankles/Calves → Knees/Thighs → Hips/Pelvis → Belly/Lower Back → Chest/Upper Back → Shoulders/Arms → Neck/Jaw → Face/Scalp
ascending.description: Building up to final release in head/face

descending.name: Head → Feet (Releasing Down)
descending.sequence: Scalp/Crown → Forehead/Temples → Eyes/Cheeks → Jaw/Mouth → Neck/Throat → Shoulders/Upper Back → Upper Arms → Elbows/Forearms → Hands/Fingers → Chest/Ribcage → Belly/Solar Plexus → Lower Back/Pelvis → Upper Legs → Knees → Lower Legs → Feet → Toes
descending.description: Releases down into earth, gravity assists

key_language: Moving now to...
And now...
Noticing now...
Feel your [body part], releasing...
Softening, releasing, melting
Each part releasing, replenishing, renewing
dream_arcs.timing: Each body part: 20-30 seconds = ~7-8 minutes total. Can repeat 2-3 times in 30-minute journey.
dream_arcs.prompt_integration: Use systematic body progression. Include functional suggestions during PMR ('as your muscles release, your body heals'). Multiple passes get slower and more detailed.

dream_arcs.name: Enchanted Interior Greenhouse (DREAM Landscape)
dream_arcs.description: Lush indoor paradise, no wind, magical stillness, complete shelter
dream_arcs.core_message: Protected, abundant, perfectly still - a magical sanctuary
elements: Pools of still water reflecting plants
key_language: Lush
Still
Sheltered
Abundant
Verdant
Magical
Stepping into a vast greenhouse, warm and lush
Palms reaching toward a glass ceiling revealing stars
Air perfectly still, fragrant with jasmine and earth
dream_arcs.prompt_integration: Rich sensory detail. Emphasize stillness and shelter. Create magical but peaceful atmosphere. No weather, no wind - perfect control.

dream_arcs.name: River Journey (DREAM Landscape)
dream_arcs.description: Floating down gentle river, each moment body replenishing completely
dream_arcs.core_message: Carried effortlessly, replenishing continuously, timeless flow
elements: Floating on back or in gentle boat
River knows where to take you
key_language: Floating
Drifting
Carried
Supported
Meandering
Floating on a gentle river, warm water holding you perfectly
The current carries you, your body replenishes itself completely
Every cell renewed with each moment
dream_arcs.prompt_integration: Link continuous replenishment to river flow. Emphasize zero effort. Create timeless, dreamlike quality. Water as support and renewal.

dream_arcs.name: Moonlit Garden (DREAM Landscape)
dream_arcs.description: Classic peaceful garden bathed in soft moonlight
dream_arcs.core_message: Beauty, peace, gentle light, timeless tranquility
key_language: Moonlight
Silvery
Gentle shadows
Night blooming flowers
Soft paths
Peaceful garden
Garden bathed in soft moonlight, flowers glowing
dream_arcs.prompt_integration: Classic peaceful imagery. Emphasize gentleness and beauty. Moonlight as soft, safe illumination.

dream_arcs.name: Forest at Twilight (DREAM Landscape)
dream_arcs.description: Ancient trees, soft earth, dappled light fading, deep stillness arriving
dream_arcs.core_message: Grounding, ancient wisdom, natural rhythm of day becoming night
key_language: Ancient
Grounding
Twilight
Settling
Trees standing witness
Forest growing quiet as day ends
Ancient trees, soft earth, deepening peace
dream_arcs.prompt_integration: Use natural day-to-night transition as metaphor for sleep. Ancient trees as guardians. Earth as grounding presence.

dream_arcs.name: Ocean Sanctuary (DREAM Landscape)
dream_arcs.description: Protected cove, gentle waves, maternal embrace of water
dream_arcs.core_message: Rhythmic, maternal, embracing - the ocean as mother
key_language: Rhythmic
Maternal
Embracing
Gentle waves
Protected cove
Ocean holding you like a mother
Waves arriving in perfect rhythm
dream_arcs.prompt_integration: Use wave rhythm to deepen trance. Ocean as nurturing presence. Protected from storms - only gentleness.

dream_arcs.name: Cosmic Observatory (DREAM Landscape)
dream_arcs.description: Vast night sky, infinite stars, peaceful perspective
dream_arcs.core_message: Awe without overwhelm, perspective, belonging to something vast
key_language: Vast
Infinite
Cosmic
Perspective
Stars stretching infinitely
Part of this vast peaceful universe
Held by the cosmos, safe in the infinite
dream_arcs.prompt_integration: Create awe without overwhelm. Vastness as peaceful, not scary. Client as safe observer and participant in cosmic peace.

dream_arcs.name: Mountain Meadow at Dusk (DREAM Landscape)
dream_arcs.description: High meadow, wildflowers, distant peaks, clear peaceful air
dream_arcs.core_message: Elevated peace, clarity, gentle transition to night
key_language: Elevated
Clear
Meadow
Twilight
Mountain peace
High meadow where air is clear and peaceful
Wildflowers settling as day ends
dream_arcs.prompt_integration: Use elevation as metaphor for perspective without losing safety. Clear air, clear mind. Gentle transition to night.

dream_arcs.name: Desert Night (DREAM Landscape)
dream_arcs.description: Infinite stars, warm rock, profound silence, primordial stillness
dream_arcs.core_message: Stillness, spaciousness, connection to ancient earth
key_language: Stillness
Silence
Spacious
Primordial
Ancient
Desert night, stars infinite, silence profound
Rock still warm, holding you gently
dream_arcs.prompt_integration: Deep silence as positive presence. Spaciousness as freedom. Ancient landscape connecting to timeless peace within.

dream_arcs.name: Multisensory Delight (DREAM Enhancement)
dream_arcs.description: Rich sensory detail enhancing immersion in any landscape
dream_arcs.core_message: See it, hear it, feel it, smell it - fully immersed
key_language: Notice the texture...
Feel the temperature...
Hear the gentle...
See the way the light...
The scent of...
Rich sensory detail bringing this moment fully alive
dream_arcs.prompt_integration: Layer sensory modalities through chosen landscape. Touch, sound, sight, smell, hint of taste. Build rich immersive experience.
